title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Design and Evaluation of Generative AI-Integrated Language Learning Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital competence and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Produce and present at least five types of work-related language content using generative AI tools (chatbots, translators, etc.)
Critically analyze AI-generated outputs and write project reports applying ethical usage principles
Design AI-integrated language learning scenarios by PBL teams and evaluate their applicability to real work environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
